name: crestmatic
description: A Matic project used to generate CREST documentation.

scripts.test: node node_modules/crestschema/crestschemaspider.js https://crest.eveonline.com && mv *-v*.json schemas && rm -rf web && node node_modules/matic/bin/matic

author: Jim Purbrick <jimpurbrick@gmail.com> (http://jimpurbrick.com/)
